io.rouz.task.TaskContext

    Package Description

    • Uses of TaskContext in io.rouz.task

      Methods in io.rouz.task that return TaskContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TaskContext TaskContext.async(ExecutorService executorService)
      Create an asynchronous TaskContext that executes all evaluation on the given ExecutorService.
      TaskContext TaskContext.Value.context()
      The TaskContext that created this value.
      static TaskContext TaskContext.inmem()
      Create a default, in-memory, immediate TaskContext.

    • Uses of TaskContext in io.rouz.task.context

      Classes in io.rouz.task.context that implement TaskContext 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AsyncContext
      A TaskContext that executes evaluation and Value computations on a given ExecutorService.
      class  InMemImmediateContext
      A TaskContext that evaluates tasks immediately and memoizes results in memory.
